passive.name: THE DARKIN SCYTHE
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) THE DARKIN SCYTHE
                                Kayn the Shadow Assassin fighters Rhast the Darkin Slayer for control.Damaging ranged champions charge theÂ Shadow Assassin, and damaging, melee champions charge theÂ Darkin Slayer. At full charge, Kayn can permanently transform at his base.Shadow Assassin: After Kayn has not taken damage from champions for 5 seconds, his attacks and abilities deal an additional 48 - 62% magic damage () to enemy champions for 3 seconds.Darkin Slayer: Kayn heals for 20% () of physical damage dealt to champions.
notes: ranged champions charge theÂ Shadow Assassin, and damaging, melee champions charge theÂ Darkin Slayer

q.name: (Q) REAPING SLASH
q.description:
(Q) REAPING SLASH
 6.5/6/5.5/5s   50 
                                
                                
                                Shadow Assassin:Â Dashes and deals 70 physical damage (70/100/130/160 + 60/65/70/75% bonus ), then spins his scythe deal the same damage.Darkin Slayer: Deals 42 (60/65/70/75% ) plusÂ 7% (+7% + 0.06% bonus )Â of the target's maximum health as physical damage instead.Deals an additional 35 physical damage (Max 235/310/385/460) to minions and monsters.

w.name: (W) BLADE'S REACH
w.description:
(W) BLADE'S REACH
 12/11/10/9s   50/60/70/80 
                                
                                
                                Swipes the scythe upward, dealing 105 physical damage (105/165/225/285 + 110% bonus ) and slowing enemies hit by 90% decaying over 1.5 seconds.Shadows Assassin: Kayn can move while using this ability and increases its range.Darkin Slayer: Additionally clocks up enemies hit for 1 seconds.

e.name: (E) SHADOW STEP
e.description:
(E) SHADOW STEP
 18s   50 
                                
                                
                                Gains 35% movement speed and can move through terrain for 5/5.5/6/6.5 seconds. Kayn restores 100 health (100/120/140/160 +Â 50% bonus ) upon entering terrain for the fist time.Being immobilized or spending more than 1.2 consecutive seconds outside of terrain or in combat with enemy champions ends this ability early.Shadow Assassin: Gain 75% movement speed instead and become immune to slows. The cooldown is reduced to 7 seconds.

r.name: (R) UMBRAL TRESPASS
r.description:
(R) UMBRAL TRESPASS
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Infests an enemy champion for 2.5 seconds, becoming untargetable. When the infestation ends, the target is dealt 200 physical damage (200/300/400 + 165% bonus ).Re-cast: Ends the infestation early.Shadows Assassin: Increase this ability's range, the distance Kayn exits, and refreshes The Darkin Scythe's cooldown on exit.Darkin Slayer:Â Deals 15% of the target's maximum health as physical damage instead (15% + 0.13% bonus ) and Kayn heals for 12% (12% + 0.1% bonus ) of the target's maximum health.
notes: range, the distance Kayn exits, and refreshes The Darkin Scythe's cooldown on exit

runes_detailed.description: Gain tenacity for each Legend stack (max 10 stacks). Earn progress toward Legend stacks for every champion takedown, epic monster takedown, and minion kill.
